Use a mixture of water and vinegar toze your skin, as vinegar is a natural disinfectant and deodorizer.
Use a dry cloth or paper towel to remove dirt and sweat from your skin.
Use a natural cleanser made from ingredients like baking soda,ilyu, and lemon juice.
Use a body brush or loofah to scrub away dirt and bacteria from your skin.
Use a mixture of honey and water to clean and moisturize your skin. Honey has natural antibacterial properties and can help soothe and heal any irritation.
